channel.title: Openvpn on [self writeBlog];
channel.description: Recent content in Openvpn on [self writeBlog];

item.title: OpenVPN block-outside-dns
item.description: Recently I had issues with my VPN setup, specifically with my VPN over at premiumize.me. They seem to have added the block-outside-dns option to their OpenVPN setup. As that’s a Windows only question it doesn’t work on my OS X/Arch Linux machine and causes problems. The error message was: Unrecognized option or missing or extra parameter(s) in [PUSH-OPTIONS]:6: block-outside-dns (2.4.0) You can fix that (given you run OpenVPN >= 2.
